title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 58-5.11 - Licensure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 58-5.11 - Licensure

State Regulations

No person shall own or operate a hematopoietic progenitor cell procurement service, processing facility or transplantation facility in New York State unless licensed by the department under Subpart 52-2 of this Title. All provisions of Subpart 52-2 of this Title shall apply to a hematopoietic progenitor cell procurement service, processing facility and/or transplantation facility, except for the recordkeeping requirements contained in section
52-2.9
of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
58-5.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
